title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, August 3, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss describes the Confederate camp at Mechanicsville, especially the surrounding countryside and the availability of supplies. He relates news of a skirmish, and reports that the Confederate forces are expanding in numbers.
keywords: Family, Troop Movement, Home Front, Battle Description, Women, Enlistment, Military Authority, Medicine/Hospitals, Agriculture, American Civil War
